tagline: Helping Hands, Just a Tap Away
mission: To simplify everyday life in small towns by connecting people with trusted local helpers for errands, repairs, and deliveries — all in one reliable app.
concept: A hyperlocal digital marketplace connecting residents with verified local helpers for errands, repairs, and deliveries. Users pay a small handling charge for convenience.

user_side: Open app and select category (Home Services, Errands, Local Rides, Medicine Delivery, Parcel Drop).
Fill a quick request form with pickup/drop location and task details.
Get matched with nearby verified helpers.
Chat, confirm, and pay via UPI or cash.
Track task status and rate the helper after completion.
helper_side: Register and upload ID for verification.
Select service areas and working hours.
Receive task notifications from nearby users.
Accept, complete, and get paid instantly (minus handling fee).
Track daily and weekly earnings in dashboard.
admin_side: Run local sponsor ads or promotions.

user_features: Live order tracking with task status

use_cases.solution: Request helper to buy and deliver medicines within 30 minutes.

use_cases.scenario: Small shop needs local parcel delivery
use_cases.solution: Nearby delivery boy accepts task and completes delivery same day.
Book verified local technician and pay ₹20 handling fee.

use_cases.scenario: User needs a ride to market
use_cases.solution: Book verified local auto or driver within the app.

target_market.location_type: Small towns with population between 10,000 to 100,000
target_market.market_gap: Limited access to big delivery/service apps like Swiggy or Dunzo
